problemsub.f90

00001 !******************************************************************************
00002 ! Subroutine to take in the problem number and call the appropriate problem
00003 !******************************************************************************
00004 ! REQUIRED FILES:
00005 ! PRECISION_VARS.F90     *DEFINES PRECISION FOR ALL VARIABLES
00006 ! CONTROL_VARIABLES.F90  *CONTAINS VARIABLES USED IN THE PROGRAM
00007 ! VANDERPOL.F90          *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR VANDERPOL
00008 ! PURESCHI.F90           *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR PURESCHI & RUSSO
00009 ! KAPS.F90               *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR KAPS
00010 ! KREISS.F90             *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR KREISS'
00011 ! ROSSLER_CHAOS.F90      *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR Rossler_Chaos
00012 ! OREGONATOR.F90         *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR OREGONATOR
00013 ! BRUSSELATOR.F90        *PROBLEM CONSTANTS FOR BRUSSELATOR 
00014 ! BURGERS_MOD.F90        *PROBLEM CONSTANTS AND ROUTINES FOR BURGERS
00015 ! BOSCARINO31_MOD.F90    *PROBLEM CONSTANTS AND ROUTINES FOR BOSCARINO-31
00016 !******************************************************************************
00017       module problemsub_mod
00018       
00019       use precision_vars,    only: wp      
00020       use control_variables, only: programstep
00021       
00022       implicit none;save
00023       
00024       private
00025       public :: problemsub
00026       
00027       contains
00028       
00029       subroutine problemsub(iprob,nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,time,akk,L)
00030 
00031       use control_variables, only: resE,resI,uvec
00032       use vanderPol_mod,     only: vanderPol
00033       use Pureschi_mod,      only: Pureschi
00034       use Kaps_mod,          only: Kaps
00035       use Kreiss_mod,        only: Kreiss
00036       use Lorenz_mod,        only: Lorenz
00037       use Rossler_mod,       only: Rossler_Chaos
00038       use Oregonator_mod,    only: Oregonator
00039       use Brusselator_mod,   only: Brusselator
00040       use Burgers_Module,    only: Burgers
00041       use Boscarino31_Mod,   only: Boscarino31
00042    
00043       !PROBLEM PARAMETERS
00044       integer,  intent(in   ) :: iprob
00045       integer,  intent(  out) :: nveclen
00046       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: ep
00047       real(wp), intent(inout) :: dt
00048       real(wp), intent(  out) :: tfinal
00049       integer,  intent(in   ) :: iDT
00050       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: time
00051       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: akk
00052       integer,  intent(in   ) :: L
00053       real(wp), dimension(size(uvec)) :: resE_vec,resI_vec
00054 
00055       if     (iprob==1)  then
00056        call vanderPol(    nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00057       elseif (iprob==2)  then
00058        call Pureschi(     nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00059       elseif (iprob==3)  then
00060        call Kaps(         nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00061       elseif (iprob==4)  then
00062        call Kreiss(       nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,time,resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00063       elseif (iprob==5)  then 
00064        call Lorenz(       nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00065       elseif (iprob==6)  then 
00066        call Rossler_Chaos(nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00067       elseif (iprob==7)  then 
00068        call Oregonator(   nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00069       elseif (iprob==8)  then 
00070        call Brusselator(  nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00071       elseif (iprob==9)  then
00072        call Burgers(      nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,time,resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00073       elseif (iprob==10) then
00074        call Boscarino31(  nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,     resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00075       endif
00076       
00077       select case(programstep)
00078         case('BUILD_RHS')  
00079           resE(:,L)=resE_vec(:)
00080           resI(:,L)=resI_vec(:)
00081       end select
00082 
00083       end subroutine problemsub
00084       end module problemsub_mod
